ISSUE.TITLE: Log Downloads don't work in firefox
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: You can't download the log by clicking the download log button in firefox, works fine in chrome. See also: https://discourse.drone.io/t/firefox-download-button-does-not-work/4730/2
